translations: Add a new event to the timeline

Someone modified this event while you were editing it! Please copy-paste (or remember) your changes not to lose them, then reload the page to see the other person's modifications, then reenter your changes.
The edition of this event has failed
Our service could not create a view token for this timeline:
This action can only be performed on an existing timeline.
No view token can be generated for this timeline.
Your timeline has been created! Are you ready to create your first event?
You cannot delete the title of the timeline.
Select a category for your event, or create a new one
Select if you want this event to be hidden when sharing your timeline.

Do you really want to remove this event? Changing history cannot be undone. If you only want to change its _visibility_, other means than deletion are ****or will be**** possible (specific category display or privacy level,
Click below to create your own timeline. You may enter a name and a short description.
Describe what your timeline is about (this can be changed later)
Choose the name of your timeline (this will be used in its URL)
This is the title of your timeline. You can modify it by clicking on the pencil at the top-left of your screen.
Add a description of the event you want to share
Download the timeline as a CSV file
Select a title for your event
Make your own timeline and show the world!
Import your timeline from a CSV file
You may add to your event an image, a video, a pdf, ... The full documentation of possible media formats can be found below:
Only events between those two values - included - will be displayed
What is the importance level of your event? 0 = very important
You can share your timeline with others without giving the rights to edit it. Select the timeline you want to share
Enter the URL or the name of your timeline
Select relevant keywords for your event
Select a unique identifier for your event. If it has not been set, the event headline will be used as an identifier.
